about.title: Who We Are
about.intro: WASL is the commercial brand of Al-Sabereen Labor Transportation and General Supplies Company, established to be the ideal solution for labor transportation and logistical support within Egypt.
about.description: We are committed to providing integrated, professional transportation services that meet the daily needs of factories and companies, through a fully equipped fleet of microbuses and transport vehicles, with precise operational management and alternative plans that ensure uninterrupted business continuity.

2014.title: Company Founded
2014.desc: Al-Sabereen established as a workforce transportation company

2018.title: Fleet Expansion
2018.desc: Expanded fleet to serve major industrial areas across Egypt

2021.title: WASL Brand Launch
2021.desc: Launched WASL as our commercial brand with enhanced services

2025.title: Digital Transformation
2025.desc: Implementing GPS tracking, e-invoicing and digital operations

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: At WASL, we strive to be the first choice for companies and factories in the field of labor transportation and logistical support within Egypt, through safe, innovative, and sustainable services. We focus on achieving global standards in logistics, project management, and labor recruitment.
pillars: Safety First: Protecting every worker during their journey
Innovation: Developing modern operating and monitoring systems
Sustainability: Operating efficient, economical, and eco-friendly fleet
Partnerships: Enhancing cooperation with major companies

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: WASL, the commercial arm of Al-Sabereen Labor Transport and General Supplies, seeks to be the mainstay in the field of labor transportation and logistical services within Egypt, by providing practical solutions that ensure high efficiency and complete reliability.
commitments: Providing safe and fast labor transportation services with emergency alternatives
Investing in technology such as tracking systems and fleet management
Reducing costs and increasing efficiency through flexible solutions
Supporting industrial growth by facilitating worker movement
Contributing to economic development through operational stability

testimonial1.text: WASL has been our trusted transportation partner for over 3 years. Their reliability and professional service have been essential to our operations.
testimonial1.author: Operations Manager

testimonial2.text: Their GPS tracking and backup systems give us peace of mind. We never worry about our employees' transportation.
testimonial2.author: HR Director

testimonial3.text: The e-invoicing system and documented contracts make our accounting processes seamless. True professionalism.
testimonial3.author: Finance Manager
